p: However, not only DRMs can affect sensitivity changes to drugs. Previous studies have shown that the virological outcomes of a therapy can be related to subtype-specific differences, pointing to the importance of analyzing the features of HIV subtypes for an improved understanding of viral subtype variability in the occurrence of DR [ 13, 15, 16, 22, 32, 33, 34, 35, 36, 37, 38].
